entities.name: dementors
entities.description: The Patronus is fighting against the dementors on the lake.

entities.name: patronus
entities.description: A magical entity that takes the form of a horse and later a stag to fight against the dementors.

entities.name: prongs
entities.description: The Patronus is revealed to be Prongs, one of Harry's father's nicknames.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the person who is watching the Patronus fight against the dementors.

entities.name: horse
entities.description: The Patronus initially takes the form of a horse.

entities.name: unicorn
entities.description: The Patronus is not a unicorn.

entities.name: stag
entities.description: The Patronus later takes the form of a stag.

entities.name: lake
entities.description: The location where Harry is watching the Patronus fight against the dementors.

entities.name: moon
entities.description: The moon is shining brightly above the lake.

relationships.description: The Patronus is fighting against the dementors on the lake.
The Patronus returns to Harry after fighting against the dementors.
The Patronus is revealed to be Prongs, one of Harry's father's nicknames.
